Our new website looks great and we couldn't recommend Ben enough.

review.comment:
My company were looking to revitalise our dated  website. We were looking for something that was fresh and modern but would also still have a corporate feel to it.

Ben absolutely nailed it!

Ben is highly motivated, professional and very patient meaning that together we could design the exact website we wanted. Now we have a website to be proud of and already we know that our customers really like it too.

Highly recommended from all at IADA limited.

Excellent work Ben. Thank you 👍🏻
review.review_reply: Thank you for your Review Jamie. 🙌

review.comment: Excellent service, proactive and always available, attractive and professional webpage for our client base
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Michael, I enjoyed working on your new website and good luck with your new venture.

review.comment:
I approached Ben when looking to develop strong branding for my new jewellery business. I had seen some examples of Ben’s work on his Instagram page and knew that he was a good fit for me and would produce what I needed. Having roughly designed my logo, Ben then built a brand identity around this, liaising with me every step of the way. Ben was sure to seek my input on colours I liked and didn’t like and similarly with fonts used throughout.

Despite only being in the position to start up some social media pages and an online store at the point at which I contacted Ben, he provided me with mock ups of many more designs such as website pages, business cards and store fronts. This was invaluable and really helped me to envisage my brand and business going forward. On the technical side, Ben was great at helping me understand how to create social media content in line with the branding guidelines he had created, to ensure everything I posted was professional and consistent. Ben was very helpfully able to talk me through everything he had produced and was a great sounding board when I had questions about the content or how I was developing the business and brand.

I will definitely be referring dotwall and Ben to others and will be coming back to develop my website, and other materials, shortly.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words Anisha, looking forward to seeing your brand come to life 😊

review.comment:
Being a novice in this field; working with Ben aka Dotwall in designing our website, has been both a humbling and inspiring experience.

Ben embraced our vision from the onset and has designed a website that not only showcases our product but more importantly, looks great and has far exceeded our expectations.

His knowledge, versatility and patience in all things ‘web design’, is second to none.

Our website is about promoting 'Positive Words' and to ‘take a leaf from our own book’ and use a Word that best describes our experience with Ben aka Dotwall Design: FAITH – Does not make things easy, it makes them possible. Thank you Ben🙏
MON PÈRE WORDS
review.review_reply: Thank you, Pearl

review.comment:
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
Outstanding service from start to finish. My new website was completed in a matter of weeks and the communication between myself and Ben couldn’t have been easier. The quality, visual/design and function of my new site is second to none which has lead to new visitors and business.
Ben has also offered continuing support and guidance with my website performance and content.

Stu Matthews
STU-NIQUE FITNESS
review.review_reply: Thanks for the review Stu, it has been awesome working with you 👍

review.comment: Loved working with ben @Dotwall on our recent project, nothing was too much trouble, really felt all focus was on creating the perfect end product. Highly Recommend and looking forward to future projects!
review.review_reply: Hey Josh - thank you for the review. Look forward to more projects together 👍

review.comment:
Ben, I wanted to write this review to thank you for all your help and support that you have given to me with regards to my new website.

After discussing my initial website ideas with you, I instantly felt that you understood the importance of wanting a website to engage new customers and also to promote my shop/floral work, bouquets, weddings & sympathy tributes.

You gave me lots of guidance and ideas, as well as listened to my suggestions and combined both ideas to create something amazing! I’m also so pleased with how the website is in keeping with the shops style and colour scheme. Any changes or add on’s have been completed very quickly and hassle free with constant communication.

You have also given me lots of useful tips and advice on how to generate more traffic on the website, things I would never have even considered or thought of.

You are clearly extremely passionate about what you do and that stands out in your work, and also in supporting your clients to find them the best solution.

Thank you so much for the continued support and for my new website, highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Hey Danielle, thank you for your review, I'm really please you love your new website :)

review.comment: “We definitely made the right decision in choosing Dotwall to build our website and help establish our online presence and branding. The communication with Ben throughout the process was first class. As is the continued service in providing updates and maintenance. Highly recommended!”
review.review_reply: Thank you BlueEarth :) Pleasure working with you on blueearthconstruction.co.uk 👍

review.comment:
Ben was recommended to me and now I'm recommending him to you!  I find most tech stuff really challenging so it was great to work with someone as patient as Ben who helped explain everything in simple terms, even the really basic stuff that went over my head!

I couldn't be happier with the look and feel of the site. It's really user friendly, with lots of little touches that really enhance the design. I've had lots of fantastic feedback on it - including from several people who also work in web design and optimisation and they assure me it's ticking all the boxes!

Ben is very easy going and responsive which made the whole experience pretty seamless and enjoyable. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him. Thanks again Ben, I'm so pleased with my new site!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kinds words Sally, enjoyed working on your website :)

review.comment: So pleased with my design... exactly what I wanted. Great communication, and kept me up to date with ideas. Very pleased indeed.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Georgina 😊

review.comment:
Ben is an absolutely awesome guy to work with if you want a new website creating.  I needed a website for my bike fitting business and found Ben.  Although he was already aware of the trade itself, he has a great understanding of not only how a website of today needs to look in order to attract customers, but he also understands the marketing side of it to help persuade a customer to buy into what you're selling.  He sees the website from the customers eyes, and has that open minded approach.
He made me feel more confident about what I'm offering, and therefore kept the wording of the main pages simple, direct and persuasive!
I was educated in how to make simple changes to the website if required, but he was always on hand to help make changes if they seemed more complex.
He has an eye for quality and detail down to the finest pixel of an image you might want to use for your website, it has to be perfect or there's no point!
Ben also offers a maintenance package as part of his services which means you can just relax and know your website is secure, optimised and being looked after properly.  A very worthwhile investment.

You won't be disappointed with Dotwall Web Design.
review.review_reply: Thank you, Graeme, it’s been awesome working with you. 👍👍

review.comment: Just wanted to say a big thank you to Ben @Dotwall. Ben actually approached me initially many moons ago about helping create a website for my business, which at the time I wasn’t to interested in. Months later, we had another discussion and it seemed that the time was right. Within days I was presented with a draft website build, branding and logos etc. On the whole I was really happy, but together we discussed certain areas that we both felt could work better. I designed a rough logo of what I wanted and again Ben adapted it, put it into reality and after a few tweaks we were there! Over the course of a week or so. Not only did I now have a brand but also a website where customers can enquire and make bookings whilst showcasing my work and customer reviews.  Really excited to see where this takes me moving forwards. And a big shout out to Ben who was there through the whole process! Highly recommended.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Matt - pleasure working with you  👍

review.comment: Used Ben to design my new website for my company. He did a great job and I got exactly what I asked for. Very pleased. Highly recommend
review.review_reply: Thanks Lee! Pleasure doing business.

Great quality logo, website and artwork provided by Ben for my business. Work was done quick and outcome was exactly what I wanted and asked for . Would definitely recommend. Andy
WilkandCo.com
